p: A sample of fresh erial parts of T. serrulatus, was collected during the flowering stage (October 2018) from the Amba Alaje mountain area located in Amba Alaje District (12° 59′ 54.4″N, 39° 32′ 52.3″E) South Tigray, Ethiopia. After it was collected, the plant material was identified according to the Flora of Tropical Africa ( Daniel, 1900) and authenticated by botanist, Dr Getinet Masresha from the Department of Biology, University of Gondar and for further reference, the specimen has been deposited at the herbarium of the University with voucher number TH-001/2011.
